group_1.narration: We only heard she went missing yesterday...
Hazuki was the one who told us about it.

group_1.textLeft: What?! She's missing?!
Looks that way.

group_1.textRight: Huh?! But how could she be missing?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I don't know all the details...
And judging from your responses, you guys@don't know anything about it either, huh?
What do you think? Any ideas on what might@have happened to her?
We still don't really know her all that well.
Hmm, I see. Darn it... Where could she have@gone?

group_1.textRight: Sounds like not having the Coordinator@around isn't good.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it causes all kinds of problems.
She's a real rarity, the way she can take@care of other Magical Girls like she does.
(Though she makes sure we compensate@her well enough, I guess.)
Besides, she's kind of like a relay antenna@for us.
Tons of Magical Girls drop in on her place@every day.
Which means she knows all kinds of gossip@and information...
That side of the Coordinator fills a pretty@special role too.

group_1.textRight: So you're saying...if us Magical Girls want@to keep doing what we do...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I think so.
Konoha and Ayame feel the same way. They're@out looking for her too.
And it's not just us, either.
Loads of other Magical Girls are out looking@for the Coordinator.
You really don't notice how much someone@means until they're gone...

group_1.textRight: Guess we didn't know how important she@was at all...

group_1.textLeft: We should look for her, too!
Aww! That'd be a big help!
All right, I'll let you girls know what I've@figured out so far!

group_1.narration: That was how we heard about@"Endless Mirrors" for the first time.
After we heard the details, we started@searching for Mitama in the Mansion.
Why? Because it was really interesting!
Oh, but don't get me wrong!@It wasn't JUST because we were curious!
Somehow...and I'm not sure how, but...@The whole thing was kind of exciting...
And so there the three of us were...

group_1.textLeft: Here we are in Endless Mirrors!

group_1.textRight: The atmosphere here is just as strange as@Hazuki described it.

group_1.textLeft: Sure is!

group_1.textRight: Now, where should we start searching?

group_1.textLeft: I just gotta say...
This place is really something else! Look how@many mirrors there are!
I'm no Mito, but even I'm getting excited@about this!
[chara:301300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eep!
Wh-what's up, Seika?

group_1.textRight: You're getting a little carried away!

group_1.textLeft: O-oh, sorry...

group_1.textRight: Don't you think so, too, Mito?

group_1.textLeft: W-well, I guess...
Huh? I was just agreeing with Seika.
Was this my fault...?

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* You know we just got here.

group_1.textLeft: Sorry...

group_1.textCenter: Uh, I know I just told you about it...
But it might be better for you to keep away@from Endless Mirrors.
Sorry! You should pass on that one! Maybe@next time, yeah?
It has its ways of deceiving you, is how I'd@put it. And then...
N-no, it's not actually like it swallows you@up.
It's more like it FEELS like you're getting@swallowed up.
And then things start getting weird in all@kinds of ways.
To be honest, even we don't know all there@is to know about that place.

group_1.narration: What if our minds weren't racing because we@sensed the Coordinator...but something else?
I really started regretting not@listening to Hazuki's warning...
